name: Clumsy Runners Demo
description:
You're unlucky space explorer.

Learn not to fall down with each step. Learn to move slowly. Then learn to run.

Now try to run away from creatures on a planet you are currently exploring.

Buy upgrades.

Go to another planet.

Add a bit of humor.

That's Clumsy Runners.

The Game Demo

This is demo version with 2 levels. Your ultimate goal here is to run through both of them. Sounds simple, but running is not easy. You have to control character's legs to move. Press button - move right leg, press another button - move left leg. Make a mistake and you fell down, then eaten by alien creature. If you die, you start from the beginning. Additional lifes are not provided.

Complete game contains 10 procedural levels. Available mid June on Steam and Itch.io.

Clumsy Runners full version on Steam
